TestCase.name: testCsvTableSource
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(score=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, csvSource, source: [selectedFields=[id, first, last, score]]]])

TestCase.name: testCsvTableSourceWithLimitPushdown
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSort(fetch=[2]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], first=[$1], last=[$2], score=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, csvSource, source: [selectedFields=[id, first, last, score]]]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[builtin, default, csvSource, source: [selectedFields=[id, first, last, score], limit=2]]], fields=[id, first, last, score])
